starkcoder.failfast

Class FailFast

  • java.lang.Object
    • starkcoder.failfast.AFailFast
      • starkcoder.failfast.FailFast
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    ICheckerReference, ICallContractorReference, IFailerReference, IFailFast

    public class FailFast
extends AFailFast
    Default implementation of IFailFast.

    This is a mix-in of references to IChecker, IFailer and ICallContractor.

    Author:
    Keld Oelykke

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      FailFast()
      Default constructor.
      FailFast(IChecker checker, IFailer failer, ICallContractor callContractor)
      Recommended constructor receiving required references (manual constructor dependency injection).

    • Constructor Detail

      • FailFast

        public FailFast()
        Default constructor.

        After using this constructor remember to set Checker, Failer and CallContractor before use.

      • FailFast

        public FailFast(IChecker checker,
        IFailer failer,
        ICallContractor callContractor)
        Recommended constructor receiving required references (manual constructor dependency injection).

        This is ready for use after this call.

        Parameters:
        checker - checker to use
        failer - failer to use
        callContractor - call contractor to use
